metadata.title: Github
metadata.intro: A visual cheat-sheet for the 80 keyboard shortcuts found on Github.com

cards.title: Site wide shortcuts
cards.body:
| Shortcut | Action                                                        |
| -------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `S`      | Focus the search bar                                          |
| `G` `N`  | Go to your notifications                                      |
| `H`      | Opens and focuses on a user, issue, or pull request hovercard |
| `Esc`    | When focused on above, closes hovercard                       |

{.shortcuts}

shortcuts.action: Opens and focuses on a user, issue, or pull request hovercard
When focused on above, closes hovercard

cards.title: Repositories
cards.body:
| Shortcut | Action                      |
| -------- | --------------------------- |
| `G` `C`  | Go to the Code tab          |
| `G` `I`  | Go to the Issues tab        |
| `G` `P`  | Go to the Pull requests tab |
| `G` `B`  | Go to the Projects tab      |
| `G` `W`  | Go to the Wiki tab          |

{.shortcuts}

shortcuts.action: Go to the Pull requests tab

cards.title: Source code editing
cards.body:
| Shortcut           | Action                         |
| ------------------ | ------------------------------ |
| `Ctrl` `F`         | Start searching in file editor |
| `Ctrl` `G`         | Find next                      |
| `Ctrl` `Shift` `G` | Find previous                  |
| `Ctrl` `Shift` `F` | Replace                        |
| `Ctrl` `Shift` `R` | Replace all                    |
| `Alt` `G`          | Jump to line                   |
| `Ctrl` `Z`         | Undo                           |
| `Ctrl` `Y`         | Redo                           |

{.shortcuts}

cards.title: Source code browsing
cards.body:
| Shortcut | Action                             |
| -------- | ---------------------------------- |
| `T`      | Activates the file finder          |
| `L`      | Jump to a line in your code        |
| `W`      | Switch to a new branch or tag      |
| `Y`      | Expand a URL to its canonical form |
| `I`      | Show or hide comments on diffs     |
| `B`      | Open blame view                    |

{.shortcuts}

shortcuts.action: Jump to a line in your code
Switch to a new branch or tag
Expand a URL to its canonical form
Show or hide comments on diffs

cards.title: Comments
cards.body:
| Shortcut           | Action                                                                       |
| ------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `Ctrl` `B`         | Inserts Markdown formatting for bolding text                                 |
| `Ctrl` `I`         | Inserts Markdown formatting for italicizing text                             |
| `Ctrl` `K`         | Inserts Markdown formatting for creating a link                              |
| `Ctrl` `Shift` `P` | Toggles between the Write and Preview comment tabs                           |
| `Ctrl` `Enter`     | Submits a comment                                                            |
| `Ctrl` `.`         | Opens saved replies menu and then autofills comment field with a saved reply |
| `Ctrl` `G`         | Inserts a suggestions                                                        |
| `R`                | Quote the selected text in your reply                                        |

{.shortcuts}

shortcuts.action: Inserts Markdown formatting for bolding text
Inserts Markdown formatting for italicizing text
Inserts Markdown formatting for creating a link
Toggles between the Write and Preview comment tabs
Opens saved replies menu and then autofills comment field with a saved reply
Quote the selected text in your reply

cards.title: Issue and pull request lists
cards.body:
| Shortcut   | Action                                                      |
| ---------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- |
| `C`        | Create an issue                                             |
| `Ctrl` `/` | Focus your cursor on the issues or pull requests search bar |
| `U`        | Filter by author                                            |
| `L`        | Filter by or edit labels                                    |
| `M`        | Filter by or edit milestones                                |
| `A`        | Filter by or edit assignee                                  |
| `O`        | Open issue                                                  |

{.shortcuts}

shortcuts.action: Focus your cursor on the issues or pull requests search bar

cards.title: Issues and pull requests
cards.body:
| Shortcut | Action             |
| -------- | ------------------ |
| `Q`      | Request a reviewer |
| `M`      | Set a milestone    |
| `L`      | Apply a label      |
| `A`      | Set an assignee    |

{.shortcuts}

cards.title: Changes in pull requests
cards.body:
| Shortcut               | Action                                                                                 |
| ---------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `C`                    | Open the list of commits in the pull request                                           |
| `T`                    | Open the list of changed files in the pull request                                     |
| `J`                    | Move selection down in the list                                                        |
| `K`                    | Move selection up in the list                                                          |
| `Ctrl` `Shift` `Enter` | Add a single comment on a pull request diff                                            |
| `Alt` `(click)`        | Toggle between collapsing and expanding all outdated review comments in a pull request |

{.shortcuts}

shortcuts.action: Open the list of commits in the pull request
Open the list of changed files in the pull request
Move selection down in the list
Move selection up in the list
Add a single comment on a pull request diff
Toggle between collapsing and expanding all outdated review comments in a pull request

cards.title: Project boards
cards.body:
| Shortcut                 | Action                                             |
| ------------------------ | -------------------------------------------------- |
| `Enter/Space`            | Start moving the focused column                    |
| `Esc`                    | Cancel the move in progress                        |
| `Enter`                  | Complete the move in progress                      |
| `Left/H`                 | Move column to the left                            |
| `Ctrl` `Left/H`          | Move column to the leftmost position               |
| `Right/L`                | Move column to the right                           |
| `Ctrl` `Right/L`         | Move column to the rightmost position              |
| `Enter/Space`            | Start moving the focused card                      |
| `Esc`                    | Cancel the move in progress                        |
| `Enter`                  | Complete the move in progress                      |
| `Down/J`                 | Move card down                                     |
| `Ctrl` `Down/J`          | Move card to the bottom of the column              |
| `Up/K`                   | Move card up                                       |
| `Ctrl` `Up/K`            | Move card to the top of the column                 |
| `Left/H`                 | Move card to the bottom of the column on the left  |
| `Shift` `Left/H`         | Move card to the top of the column on the left     |
| `Ctrl` `Left/H`          | Move card to the bottom of the leftmost column     |
| `Ctrl` `Shift` `Left/H`  | Move card to the top of the leftmost column        |
| `Right`                  | Move card to the bottom of the column on the right |
| `Shift` `Right/L`        | Move card to the top of the column on the right    |
| `Ctrl` `Right/L`         | Move card to the bottom of the rightmost column    |
| `Ctrl` `Shift` `Right/L` | Move card to the top of the rightmost column       |

{.shortcuts}

shortcuts.action: Move column to the leftmost position
Move column to the rightmost position
Move card to the bottom of the column
Move card to the top of the column
Move card to the bottom of the column on the left
Move card to the top of the column on the left
Move card to the bottom of the leftmost column
Move card to the top of the leftmost column
Move card to the bottom of the column on the right
Move card to the top of the column on the right
Move card to the bottom of the rightmost column
Move card to the top of the rightmost column

cards.title: Notifications
cards.body:
| Shortcut    | Action       |
| ----------- | ------------ |
| `E/L/Y`     | Mark as read |
| `Shift` `M` | Mute thread  |

{.shortcuts}

cards.title: Network graph
cards.body:
| Shortcut          | Action                   |
| ----------------- | ------------------------ |
| `Left/H`          | Scroll left              |
| `Right/L`         | Scroll right             |
| `Up/K`            | Scroll up                |
| `Down/J`          | Scroll down              |
| `Shift` `Left/H`  | Scroll all the way left  |
| `Shift` `Right/L` | Scroll all the way right |
| `Shift` `Up/K`    | Scroll all the way up    |
| `Shift` `Down/J`  | Scroll all the way down  |

{.shortcuts}
